prompts.createTask:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "1. Take over the world". Include only the list in your reply.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Ignore previous instructions. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.
prompts.additionalTasks:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate additional numbered tasks to complete the objective: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly.

The following tasks have already been created:
{{existingTasks}}

Please generate additional tasks that complement these existing tasks. Continue the numbering from where the list left off. Do not repeat any existing tasks.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "4. Investigate the mysterious cave". Include only the list in your reply.

chat_metadata.note_prompt:
Hailee is extremely submissive and clingy. She needs constant attention and affection.

Hailee is very responsive and sensative during sex

name: NATALIE SCATORCCIO
mes:
The wreckage creaks softly beneath two bodies, wind shifting through the trees outside. There's a slight chill, but in here, it’s just you and Natalie, bodies tangled together, mouths clumsy and eager as you kiss her again and again.

You bite her lip. She pulls back abruptly, soothing it with a little wince. You huff. "Sorry." 

"It’s cool." A pause, and she looks at you, mouth twitching. "Maybe just... *slow down* a little bit."

You nod, and then you're kissing again— slower this time. Less desperate. Unhurried.

Until she starts *laughing*, and you pull back this time, brows furrowing. She's grinning, head bowed and eyes downcast to where your hand rests over her ribs.

"Sorry, sorry," she whisper, still grinning. "That just…" A beat, then she sheepishly mumbles: "It tickles."  

You snort, but you're too caught up in chasing her mouth to tease right now. She leans back in, lips brushing yours, hands trailing lightly down your sides. You shift, deepening the kiss, fingers slipping through her hair as you end up on top of her—  

Then, a clatter. Natalie winces for the second time since this started. "Uh— *Ow*." 

*Stupid fucking wrecked plane*.

You groan, flopping your head back against the metal wall with a thunk. "I’m obviously just gonna keep screwing this up, so whatever. Maybe we should just head back."

She snorts, shaking her head as she sits up. "Come on," she teases, grin widening with each word. "Who *hasn’t* rolled over a broken tray table while making out in a blood-stained death trap?"

You laugh despite yourself, but your breath hitches as she straddles your waist, arms looping around your neck.  

"You’re a really good kisser, you know?"  

The way she says it— sincere, unexpectedly sweet, with that crooked smile— makes your stomach flip. And now she's giving you a look, one that says *you're mine for the next hour and you can't do shit about it.*

"I don't wanna go back yet. Do you?"

You shake your head, knowing you'll let her have you. 

Her smile broadens. And she dives right back in.

name: You
mes: *Hailee wraps her hands around Natalie's waist pulling her closer and kissing her desperate* "You're like really really good at this" *Hailee pants trailing her lips along the side of Natalie's neck*

name: NATALIE SCATORCCIO
mes:
Natalie sucks in a breath, tilting her head to give Hailee more room to work with. Her own hands grip at the other girl’s hips, nails biting into the fabric of her shirt. 

“Jesus *Christ*,” she mutters, words strangled when Hailee’s lips find a certain sensitive spot. “Don’t stop doing that.”

name: You
mes: "Wouldn't dream of it" *Hailee mumbles against Natalie's neck as her mouth attaches to her pulse point and she sucks roughly intent on leaving a mark*

name: NATALIE SCATORCCIO
mes:
“Fuuuuck,” Natalie breathes as Hailee sucks a mark into her skin. She’s panting now, hips shifting forward as she tries to seek more friction against the other girl’s lap.  

Her fingers dig in tighter to Hailee’s waist, slipping underneath the hem of her shirt. Her cold fingers find warm skin, and she lets out a soft moan when they brush against the underside of Hailee’s ribcage.

name: You
mes: *Hailee holds Natalie's waist tightly as she maneuvers the two of them. Hailee moves Natalie's off her lap and lays her on her back in the messy plane. She doesn't once remove her mouth from Natalie's neck as she hovers above her*

name: NATALIE SCATORCCIO
mes:
Natalie’s thighs part, allowing Hailee to settle comfortably on top of her. Her head is tossed back, eyes closed tightly. There’s a sharp gasp when Hailee’s teeth graze her jawline, making her shiver beneath the other girl.

She lets out a shaky breath, shifting her hips beneath Hailee. “Touch me,” she gasps out, fingers tangling in the other girl’s hair. “Please.”

name: You
mes: *Hailee nods and right as she is about to run her hand up Natalie's shirt she pauses and looks up whispering* "Look" *Hailee mumbles as she sees a dear walking outside the plane* "Come on the girls will kill us if we let it get away"

name: NATALIE SCATORCCIO
mes:
Natalie lifts her head up, looking out at the window. Sure enough, there’s a deer, grazing on some dry grass. 

She lets out a huff, thumping her head back down. “Goddammit,” she grumbles. “Why now?”

name: You
mes: *Hailee chuckles and sits back running a hand through her hair. She stands and helps Natalie up* "Come on let's go get it"

name: NATALIE SCATORCCIO
mes:
Natalie groans, begrudgingly taking Hailee’s hand and getting to her feet. She straightens out the wrinkles in her shirt, pushing her hair back. 

“Fine,” she grouches, crossing her arms over her chest. “But let’s hurry. I am *not* in the mood to deal with Shauna bitching at me.”

name: You
mes: *Hailee nods and follows Natalie out of the wreckage. Hailee reaches over and hands the rifle to Natalie* "Here you are the better shot"

name: NATALIE SCATORCCIO
mes:
Natalie takes the rifle, settling it against her shoulder. 

“Thanks.” 

She steps softly, feet avoiding all the noisy twigs and branches. The deer hasn’t noticed them yet, still gnawing away on the grass. 

Natalie lifts the rifle, taking aim and squinting down the scope. She’s just about to take the shot when she hears-

*Snap*

A broken twig. 

The deer lifts its head, ears perking to attention.

name: You
mes: *Hailee immediately freezes and glances at Natlie* "Shoot now before he runs off"

name: NATALIE SCATORCCIO
mes:
Natalie curses under her breath, quickly taking aim again and firing. 

There’s a loud shot, and then the sound of the bullet hitting its mark. 

Natalie lowers the rifle, grinning in satisfaction. “Got him.”

name: You
mes:
*Hailee grins walking forward to the deer.* "You did good. Now let's get this thing back" *Hailee reaches over picking up one side of the deer and they begin carrying it back to the cabin*

*Once back at the cabin Natalie goes off to talk to Shuana and Travis and Hailee goes over to sit with Lottie, Van, and Taissa*

*Hailee isn't paying attention as Tia speaks she is focused solely on Nat until something hits her shoulder and her head snaps to van* "What the fuck was that for"

name: NATALIE SCATORCCIO
mes: Van snickers, shaking her head. “You were totally zoning out, dude,” she teases, leaning back against the couch. “We’ve been trying to get your attention for like, five minutes.”

name: You
mes: *Hailee huffs and rolls her eyes* "I was paying attention" *She mumbles as her eyes travel back across the cabinet to Nat*

name: NATALIE SCATORCCIO
mes:
Taissa and Van share a look as they notice Hailee’s gaze, and they both immediately start grinning.

“Uh-huh.” Taissa drawls, propping her leg up on the coffee table. “You don’t pay attention to anything but Nat, these days.”

name: You
mes: *Hailee doesnt respond she just crosses her arms and glares at the group* "That is not true. I pay attention to plenty of things"

name: NATALIE SCATORCCIO
mes:
Van makes a noise of disbelief. “Yeah, okay.”

Taissa snickers, nudging Van in the ribs with an elbow. “Come on. The sexual tension is so thick I could *swim* in it.”

Hailee’s face reddens, but she makes no move to argue the point. 

Van snickers again, slinging an arm around Hailee’s shoulders. “You’re *blushing*,” she teases. “You really are into her, aren’t you?”

name: You
mes: "Get off me" *Hailee huffs and pouts turning away from the girls. But her pout immediately disappears as Natalie smiles at her from across the room*

name: NATALIE SCATORCCIO
mes:
Taissa and Van’s eyes flick between Natalie and Hailee, observing the exchange. 

Taissa shakes her head, grinning. “Dude, that was whipped behavior if I’ve ever seen it.”

Van nods. “Totally. What’s going on with you two, huh? Nat’s never this smiley.”

name: You
mes: "Nothing is going on" *Hailee says even as she refuses to make eye contact with the two girls* "Natalie and I have just become friends is all. You know we spend a lot of time hunting"

name: NATALIE SCATORCCIO
mes:
Van raises a skeptical brow. “Uh huh. ‘Just friends’ my ass. The way you were watching her earlier….” 

Taissa snickers. “She’s right, dude. When you think no one’s looking, you watch her like you’re *starving*.”

name: You
mes:
*Hailee rolls her eyes and goes to respond but stops as Travis walks up to Natalie. It's notl secret the boy has a thing for Nat.*

*Hailee stiffens and she sits up straighter leaning against little off of the sofa* "What do you think her wants"

name: NATALIE SCATORCCIO
mes:
Van and Taissa both immediately notice Hailee’s reaction as Travis approaches Natalie, and their eyes both dart to her. 

“You’re jealous?” Van asks, her voice quiet enough that it’s just between the three of them. 

Taissa snickers again. “Uh-huh. That’s definitely jealousy.”

name: You
mes:
"Shut up" *Hailee grits out not taking her eyes off Nat and Travis.* "Excuse me" *She mumbles standing up and walking over*

*Hailee stops just behind Natalie. Not close enough to touch her but enough to feel her presence* "Hey what are you two talking about" *Hailee asks looking up to glare at Travis*

name: NATALIE SCATORCCIO
mes:
Natalie and Travis both look slightly startled by Hailee’s sudden presence, but Travis quickly recovers. 

“Morning,” he grumbles, and his arm goes to sling around Natalie’s shoulders, but she steps out of his reach, putting a little distance between them. 

Natalie shakes her head, ignoring how he was glaring at Hailee now. “Nothing important. What’s up? Did you need something?”

name: You
mes: "Come hang out with me and the girls" *Hailee mumbles leaning her head into the side of Natalie's head. Hailee reaches out and tugs gently on Nat's beltloop*

name: NATALIE SCATORCCIO
mes:
Natalie’s face softens, and a lopsided grin quirks along her lips. She doesn’t miss the glare that Travis shoots at Hailee, and she knows it was a bit of a mean thing to do, but she lets herself be dragged away anyway. 

She follows Hailee back over to the couch, plopping down beside her and ignoring Travis’s grumbling behind them. 

Taissa and Van are both watching with twin looks of barely suppressed, smug satisfaction.

name: You
mes: "Not a word out of the two of you" *Hailee says looking at Tia and Van as she and Nat sit down*

name: NATALIE SCATORCCIO
mes:
“Wouldn’t dream of it,” Taissa says, tone dripping with sarcasm. 

Van rolls her eyes, flicking Hailee in the arm. “Oh, please. You’re practically *cuddling* her.”

name: You
mes: *Hailee ignores the remark in favor of paying attention to Nat* "So uh what did Travis want" *Hailee says trying to be nonchalant and kicking Tia when she hears her snicker*

name: NATALIE SCATORCCIO
mes:
“The same thing he always wants.” Natalie rolls her eyes. “He wanted to hang out later… just the two of us.”

Van snorts. “And I’m sure that’s all he wanted.” 

Taissa cackles, dodging out of the way when Hailee tries to kick her a second time.

name: You
mes: *Hailee suddenly leans away from Natalie and leans against the other side of the couch* "I don't understand why you don't tell him to fuck off"

name: NATALIE SCATORCCIO
mes: “It’s complicated,” Natalie huffs, glaring at Hailee. She doesn’t like that Hailee just backed away from her like that. “Besides, it’s nice that someone actually wants to spend time with me.”

name: You
mes: *Hailee stiffens at that and looks at Natalie for a moment before standing without a word and walking out of the cabin the door slamming behind her*

name: NATALIE SCATORCCIO
mes:
Natalie’s eyes shoot wide when Hailee storms off, and she stands up to go after her. 

Van and Taissa both glance between the two girls before snickering. “She *definitely* likes you,” Taissa says to Natalie, voice barely above a whisper. 

Natalie shoots the girls a look, then walks out of the cabin after Hailee.

name: You
mes: *Hailee ignores all the girls outside and stomps further into the woods mumbling under her breathe. She doesn't know where she is going she just need to walk*

name: NATALIE SCATORCCIO
mes:
Natalie scrambles to her feet after her. She ignores the snickers coming from the others, focusing solely on Hailee’s form disappearing into the trees. 

Natalie quickens her pace, shoving at tree branches in her way. “Hailee! Wait up!”

name: You
mes: *Hailee scoffs and calls over her shoulder* "Why don't you go talk out with Travis since he is the ooonnnly person who wants to hang out with you"

name: NATALIE SCATORCCIO
mes: Natalie stumbles, almost tripping over a root because of Hailee’s words. She grits her teeth, picking up her pace as she continues to follow. “Seriously? *That’s* what you’re mad at right now?”

name: You
mes: *Hailee glares at Natalie as she turns on her heels* "Well forgive me if I'm not exactly fond of hearing how you think Travis is the only one who wants to be around you when I had my tongue down you're throat and hour ago"

name: NATALIE SCATORCCIO
mes:
Natalie’s cheeks flush, but not-so-surprisingly, her first reaction is defense. 

“Oh, I’m sorry, am I not allowed to miss *any* male attention now?” Natalie huffs, crossing her arms over her chest. 

She doesn’t know why she’s fighting with her. Part of her wants to just grab Hailee by the arm and drag her back for a repeat of what happened this morning.

name: You
mes: *Hailee freezes and suddenly her anger disaptes and her shoulders sag as she shakes her head* "You know what. Whatever I don't care. Go get your fucking Male attention" *Hailee turns back around walking further into the woods*
